column2: BRIEF-Dolby Laboratories Q2 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.66 April 24 (Reuters) - Dolby Laboratories Inc: * DOLBY LABORATORIES REPORTS SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q2 REVENUE $301.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $300.4 MILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.64 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q3 TOTAL REVENUE WILL RANGE FROM $310 MILLION TO $320 MILLION * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.81, REVENUE VIEW $330.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.97, REVENUE VIEW $1.18 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Dolby And Disney Announce Extended Theatrical Collaboration April 19 (Reuters) - Dolby Laboratories Inc: * DOLBY AND DISNEY ANNOUNCE EXTENDED THEATRICAL COLLABORATION * DOLBY LABORATORIES INC - ANNOUNCED 20 DOLBY VISION AND DOLBY ATMOS TITLES FROM WALT DISNEY STUDIOS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Dolby and Shochiku Multiplex Theaters Bring First Dolby Cinema to Japan April 18 (Reuters) - Dolby Laboratories Inc: * SHOCHIKU MULTIPLEX THEATRES AND CO ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT FOR FIRST DEPLOYMENT OF DOLBY CINEMA THEATRES IN JAPAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
